data.title: Who We Represent
data.text:
The organizations in this coalition represent more than 3,000 locally-owned and nonprofit, community-based newsrooms who every day deliver coverage to millions of Americans in communities across the United States.

Coalition Members

The Coalition acts as a forum for groups interested in the health of local news to discuss and advocate for public policy. Here is the Steering Committee. Each group decides for itself, on a case by case basis, whether to endorse a particular policy proposal. Coalition members that endorsed our grand plan include:

The Institute for Nonprofit News (partial list, local news members)

The following are some of the newsrooms represented by the Institute of Nonprofit News. We have removed some newsrooms that do not engage in advocacy on public policy, including efforts to help local news.
